phrase: What you suspected is true, try to be kind to them, for this kindness will help everything improve.
author: Bob Johnson

phrase: A beautiful dream will come true for you and you will see how other dreams come true.
author: Bob Wilson

phrase: The reality of the human being is his thought, not his material body.
author: Eve Brown

phrase: You will marry a professional athlete. If eating competitions can be considered a sport.
author: Irene Miller

phrase: You don't have to be faster than the bear, you just have to be faster than the slowest kid running from it.
author: Frank Wilson

phrase: Don't take life too seriously. You won't get out of it alive.
author: Charlie Taylor

phrase: Tomorrow may be too late to enjoy what you have today.
author: Jack Johnson

phrase: When you look for what you most desire, remember to do your best.
author: Irene Brown

phrase: Don't forget that a friend is a gift you give to yourself.
author: Jack Brown

phrase: Rejoice, a path of beautiful passions awaits you and you must walk it.
author: Eve Wilson

phrase: A reputation of a thousand years can depend on the conduct of an hour.
author: Alice Williams

phrase: Feel the happiness that awaits you and don't forget to catch it to keep it with you.
author: Grace Moore

phrase: Rejoice, a path of beautiful passions awaits you and you must walk it.
author: Bob Moore

phrase: Not everyone can receive the same things. Be practiced.
author: Harry Williams
